siteMetadata.title: Youtube 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Youtube 上的全球热门视频

blogPost.excerpt:
With the first quarter of 2021 coming to a close, we decided to grab each of the DriveTribe founders for an update of their year so far, as well as looking forward to their plans for the rest of the year. After getting an update from Hammond (link to that video is below) we then travelled to Clarkson's farm to see how Jeremy has been and to hear what he has in store for the months to come.

Enter our competition for a chance at winning a Tesla Model 3 or £40k cash! http://bit.ly/DTwinTesla​

UK 18+, purchase necessary, ends 23:59 BST 14/06/21. 
Click this link for full terms: https://bit.ly/TeslaTerms

Watch Richard Hammond's 2021 update: https://youtu.be/H7A1ggG7BBA
blogPost.body:
With the first quarter of 2021 coming to a close, we decided to grab each of the DriveTribe founders for an update of their year so far, as well as looking forward to their plans for the rest of the year. After getting an update from Hammond (link to that video is below) we then travelled to Clarkson's farm to see how Jeremy has been and to hear what he has in store for the months to come.

Enter our competition for a chance at winning a Tesla Model 3 or £40k cash! http://bit.ly/DTwinTesla​

UK 18+, purchase necessary, ends 23:59 BST 14/06/21. 
Click this link for full terms: https://bit.ly/TeslaTerms

Watch Richard Hammond's 2021 update: https://youtu.be/H7A1ggG7BBA
blogPost.title: Jeremy Clarkson reveals details about future episodes of The Grand Tour
blogPost.author: DRIVETRIBE

localize.title: 杰里米-克拉克森透露了《大旅行》未来剧集的细节。
localize.description:
在2021年第一季度即将结束之际，我们决定找来DriveTribe的每一位创始人，让他们对今年以来的情况进行更新，同时也对今年剩下的计划进行展望。在得到Hammond的更新后（视频链接在下面），我们前往Clarkson的农场，看看Jeremy是如何度过的，并听听他在未来几个月的计划。

参加我们的比赛，就有机会赢得特斯拉Model 3或4万英镑现金！http://bit.ly/DTwinTesla。

英国18岁以上，需购买，截止北京时间14/06/21 23:59。
点击此链接查看完整条款：https://bit.ly/TeslaTerms

观看Richard Hammond的2021年更新：https://youtu.be/H7A1ggG7BBA。

localize.title: 傑里米-克拉克森透露了《大旅行》未來劇集的細節。
localize.description:
在2021年第一季度即將結束之際，我們決定找來DriveTribe的每一位創始人，讓他們對今年以來的情況進行更新，同時也對今年剩下的計劃進行展望。在得到Hammond的更新後（視頻鏈接在下面），我們前往Clarkson的農場，看看Jeremy是如何度過的，並聽聽他在未來幾個月的計劃。

參加我們的比賽，就有機會贏得特斯拉Model 3或4萬英鎊現金！http://bit.ly/DTwinTesla。

英國18歲以上，需購買，截止北京時間14/06/21 23:59。
點擊此鏈接查看完整條款：https://bit.ly/TeslaTerms

觀看Richard Hammond的2021年更新：https://youtu.be/H7A1ggG7BBA。

next.excerpt:
Watch interviews with music's biggest stars live before the 2021 Grammy Awards with hosts Jeremy Parsons and Janine Rubenstein. 

Subscribe to People ►► http://bit.ly/SubscribetoPeople

#Grammys2021 #RedCarpet #PEOPLE #Grammys #GrammyAward

Watch the newest celebrity interviews - From Jennifer Lopez to Jennifer Lawrence, Pop Stars to Movie Stars, Bachelors to Real Housewives, we’ve got it all:
https://www.youtube.com/embed/?list=PLzS8B57pacxwyamvauL4pdzZkN_3j_daW&autoplay=1

Stay on top of all the latest celebrity gossip - Scandals, news, rumors and more:
https://www.youtube.com/embed/?list=PLzS8B57pacxyPxBFbzjY5NqiJmUBvHgTE&autoplay=1

Celebrity love, romance and relationships - Never miss out on who’s dating who, recent break ups and new hook ups:
https://www.youtube.com/embed/?list=PLzS8B57pacxzBdPhE7vu69ONKbJemr4_l&autoplay=1

Celebrity style, fashion icons, outfit fails and the best dressed - Check out everything from Gigi Hadid’s legendary outfits to Eva Longoria’s timeless style:
https://www.youtube.com/embed/?list=PLzS8B57pacxzWKYCRsB6uH7Y7MDdUFdck&autoplay=1

Get all access to A-list events, award shows and parties - Who wore what, which awards were won, and was there any drama:
https://www.youtube.com/embed/?list=PLzS8B57pacxwXU_Gfe2aaqvb2E4CUI5Fg&autoplay=1

No matter if you’re into Taylor Swift or Justin Bieber, we’ve got some of the best live performances right here:
https://www.youtube.com/embed/?list=PLzS8B57pacxyPM1cEn5JXgA7xTFjlU7LJ&autoplay=1

Keep up with the Kardashians - get the latest on Kim & Kanye, and the rest of the hottest celebrity family around:
https://www.youtube.com/embed/?list=PLzS8B57pacxz-JkjNRg3wCQ71l8xXITMY&autoplay=1

PEOPLE is the #1 online news source all things pop culture. Get your fix of the hottest celebrity news, celebrity gossip, celebrity interviews, exclusive stories, red carpet events, style and updates from the world of entertainment, involving your favorite stars.

localize.title: 🔴直播。美国东部时间3月14日下午6:30，美国东部时间3月14日下午6:30
localize.description:
在2021年格莱美奖颁奖典礼前，与主持人Jeremy Parsons和Janine Rubenstein一起观看音乐界大牌明星的访谈直播。

订阅《人物》►► http://bit.ly/SubscribetoPeople

#Grammys2021 #红地毯 #PEOPLE #Grammys #GrammyAward

观看最新的名人访谈--从詹妮弗-洛佩兹到詹妮弗-劳伦斯，从流行歌星到电影明星，从单身汉到真正的主妇，我们都有。
https://www.youtube.com/embed/?list=PLzS8B57pacxwyamvauL4pdzZkN_3j_daW&autoplay=1

关注所有最新的名人八卦--丑闻、新闻、传闻等。
https://www.youtube.com/embed/?list=PLzS8B57pacxyPxBFbzjY5NqiJmUBvHgTE&autoplay=1

名人的爱情、浪漫和关系--永远不要错过谁和谁约会，最近的分手和新的勾搭。
https://www.youtube.com/embed/?list=PLzS8B57pacxzBdPhE7vu69ONKbJemr4_l&autoplay=1

名人风格、时尚偶像、服装失败和最佳穿着--看看从吉吉-哈迪德的传奇服装到伊娃-朗格利亚的永恒风格。
https://www.youtube.com/embed/?list=PLzS8B57pacxzWKYCRsB6uH7Y7MDdUFdck&autoplay=1

获取所有A-list活动、颁奖典礼和派对的信息--谁穿了什么衣服，得了什么奖，有什么戏剧性的事情。
https://www.youtube.com/embed/?list=PLzS8B57pacxwXU_Gfe2aaqvb2E4CUI5Fg&autoplay=1

无论你是喜欢泰勒-斯威夫特还是贾斯汀-比伯，我们这里都有一些最好的现场表演。
https://www.youtube.com/embed/?list=PLzS8B57pacxyPM1cEn5JXgA7xTFjlU7LJ&autoplay=1

跟上卡戴珊家族的脚步--了解金和坎耶以及其他最热门的名人家庭的最新情况。
https://www.youtube.com/embed/?list=PLzS8B57pacxz-JkjNRg3wCQ71l8xXITMY&autoplay=1
